videoSnippet.title: How (not) To Play Chess
videoSnippet.description:
Download Mproov and Improve Your Chess Today! https://app.mproov.me/AgadYouTube1
Follow MprooV on Twitter https://twitter.com/mproovapp Watch our game 3 years ago here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z-BApfi9bqc
Search all my videos easy https://agadmator-library.github.io/

Photos by Lenart Ootes
Have a great day :)

Marjan Rodić - Antonio Radić
Croatian League 2023.09.10
E20 Nimzo-Indian defence

1.d4 Nf6 2.c4 e6 3.Nc3 Bb4 4.Bd2 O-O 5.Nf3 d5 6.e3 c5 7.a3 Bxc3 8.Bxc3 Ne4 9.dxc5 Nxc3 10.bxc3 Qa5 11.Qc2 Bd7 12.cxd5 Ba4 13.Qb2 Na6 14.Bxa6 Qxa6 15.dxe6 fxe6 16.Qe2 Bb5 17.Qb2 Rad8 18.a4 Bc4 19.Nd2 Rf5 20.Nxc4 Qxc4 21.Qc2 Rfd5 22.h3 e5 23.Rf1 e4 24.Rb1 Rd2 25.Qxd2 Rxd2 26.Kxd2 Qd3+
